Package org.udem.unishop.utilities

Class SubMenu

java.lang.Object
org.udem.unishop.utilities.SubMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuComponent, MenuContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CartItemMenu, IssueMenu, MetricsMenu, MetricsOptionsMenu, OrderItemMenu, ProductMenu, ReviewMenu, UserMenu
public class SubMenu extends Object implements MenuComponent, MenuContainer
Represents a submenu that can contain various menu components.
